column5: Had some frost on the roof this morning, none at ground level. First frost was always a sign to me to head north.
It's hard to get frost at 50 degs., but it's the coolest temps we've had in months... felt good!
LOL Glen, 50 means the furnace is on?
It was -5C here Friday night (about 23F for you rednecks) and -3C this morning. Fall mornings are great. I was up and out of the house before 7 this morning. Very refreshing!!!

I can't match DanC, but I've definitely had at least three mornings (including this one!) where I had to scrape the windows on the vehicle to get going. Allso nearly wiped out walking across the back deck the other night... all coverd in frost and ice!
Dammit man!!!... that almost gave me a shiver as I was sitting here next to the window without a shirt on!
